Desc.entry: Showroom Cinema's film festival dedicated to the best the horror genre has to offer. Held over one weekend in October and features brand new films, sneak previews and classics from the archives. Aims to demonstrate the breadth and diversity of the genre, which extends way beyond the usual mainstream fare. For those aged 18 years and over. Also runs monthly horror screenings, please see http://www.showroomworkstation.org.uk for details. This year's festival dates are: 22nd-24th October 2010.
